QuestData.Title: The Grimtotem are Coming
QuestData.Description: This is going to take a while, but I'm sure we'll beat them back.$B$BYou're more good to Thousand Needles elsewhere. We have reports that the gnomes and goblins out on the flooded salt flats somehow survived on a giant barge! Rendow is on the dock. She'll get you a boat to go there.$B$BMind helping us out a little on your way to her?
QuestData.RewardText: A boat? Yes, you can have this last one.
